sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, fetchUserProfile, fetchRoutines } = useAuth(); const [profile, setProfile] = useState(null); const [routines, setRoutines] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [showSkinAssessment, setShowSkinAssessment] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const loadData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const profileData = await fetchUserProfile(); setProfile(profileData); // Check if user should be prompted for skin assessment if (!profileData.preferences || !profileData.preferences.skin_type) { setShowSkinAssessment(true); } const routinesData = await fetchRoutines(); setRoutines(routinesData || []); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading dashboard data:', error); toast.error('Failed to load your profile. Please try again.'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; loadData(); }, [fetchUserProfile, fetchRoutines]); if (loading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Welcome Header */}

Welcome back, {profile?.name || 'User'}!

{profile?.email}

Edit Profile Take Skin Assessment
{/* Skin type information */} {profile?.preferences?.skin_type ? (

Your Skin Profile

Skin Type: {profile.preferences.skin_type}
{profile.preferences.skin_concerns && profile.preferences.skin_concerns.length > 0 && (
Concerns: {profile.preferences.skin_concerns.join(', ')}
)}
) : showSkinAssessment ? (

Complete Your Skin Assessment

Take our quick skin assessment to get personalized skincare recommendations.

Start Assessment
) : null}
{/* User's Routines */}

Your Skincare Routines

Create New Routine
{routines.length === 0 ? (

No routines yet

Get started by creating your first skincare routine.

Create Routine
) : (
{routines.map((routine) => (

{routine.name}

Created on {new Date(routine.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}

{/* Steps */} {routine.steps && routine.steps.length > 0 && (
Steps:
    {routine.steps.map((step, index) => (
  1. {step}
    2. ))}
)} {/* Products */} {routine.products && routine.products.length > 0 && (
Products:
    {routine.products.map((product, index) => (
  • {product.name || product}
    • ))}
)}
))}
)}
{/* Feature cards */}
{/* Skin Analysis */}

Skin Analysis

Analyze your skin using our advanced tool and get personalized insights.

Analyze My Skin
{/* Product Recommender */}

Product Recommender

Get personalized product recommendations based on your skin profile.

Get Recommendations
{/* Skincare Routine Builder */}

Routine Builder

Create a custom skincare routine tailored to your specific needs.

Build Your Routine
); }; export default Dashboard;
